unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festivals galore! From Cannes to Kerala, cinephiles are having a field day.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festivals galore! From Cannes to Kerala, cinephiles are having a field day. Word on the street is the Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for another amazing year. They're promising a spicy mix of Bollywood blockbusters and indie gems. Think art house with a side of samosa! And speaking of regional flavors, the whispers about the upcoming International Film Festival of Kerala (I F F K) are getting louder. Expect screenings of Malayalam cinema masterpieces alongside global narratives. Plus, you know they'll be serving some bomb Onam Sadhya for the opening ceremony. Nom nom nom! Meanwhile, whispers from Delhi suggest the National Film Awards are being revamped with even more categories. Apparently, best "chai scene" is a serious contender! So grab your popcorn, folks! Festival season is here, and it's gonna be one cinematic biryani of entertainment! Stay tuned for more updates and remember to support local talent!
